quote: Which I have been aboard this ship these twenty years and never seen such wickedness, which that Madeira cost the Captain's own money and it was decanted particular into them crystal glasses that I polished myself not two days since, and now some thieving article has... which I'll not say who, but there's one or two of them young gentlemen what thinks the world owes 'em a living, and if his honour finds out before I've had time to... well, there'll be the devil to pay and no mistake, and here's me without so much as a by-your-leave or a thank-you-kindly for keeping of his affairs in order.
scenario: Killick discovers someone has been at the Captain's private Madeira.

quote:
Which I have took the greatest care with this cloth, your honour would not believe the labour, and now some villain has gone and... Lord, what is this? A stain? A stain! On the best damask, the very best, which I laid it out particular for them Portuguese ladies, and now it is ruined, utterly ruined, and not a soul aboard this barky gives a fig for the work that goes into keeping standards, not a single fig, and I shall have to... Christ, it will not come out, will it...

That would be Bonden, mark my words. Or one of them young midshipmen with their filthy paws.
scenario: Killick is laying out the best tablecloth and discovers a stain on it.

quote:
Which I only this moment finished swabbing of them boards, and now here comes word the Captain wants the great cabin made ready for them commodore and his suite, and I've scarce had time to draw breath, let alone fetch up them good glasses from the stores, and the tablecloth — which I had particular in mind the damask, the one without them spots — it's only just come from the laundry and ain't properly aired, and if there's one thing I cannot abide it's damp linen, it shows a want of respect, and now I'm to get fresh flowers, which flowers, your honour, I should like to know, when we're three weeks from any land with green things growing...

Which I shall do it, mind you. The Captain's word is law, and them visitors shall find the cabin shipshape or I'll know the reason why. But it's the notice, sir — that's what grinds me. A man might accomplish wonders with time enough, but this...

Where in God's name has young Oakes got to with them candlesticks?
scenario: Killick is asked to prepare the cabin for important visitors at very short notice.
